IIT Ropar Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Junior Research Fellow Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 18, 2025, 16:52 IST
 Indian Institute of Technology Ropar
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 18-Aug-2025 |  Punjab |  Salary : 37,000 to 37,000





The Indian Institute of Technology of Ropar (IIT Ropar) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech., M.E/ M.Tech. can grab this chance and apply for the IIT Ropar Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Punjab.

IIT Ropar Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Junior Research Fellow 	01	B.E/ B.Tech, M.E/ M.Tech

Age Limit for the IIT Ropar Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 35 years.

Selection Process for the IIT Ropar Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the IIT Ropar Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 37,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the IIT Ropar Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the IIT Ropar Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Junior Research Fellow Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Click on the application form link.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Pay the application fee (if applicable).
Submit the application form and capture the application number for further usage.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	13-08-2025
Last Date of Application	25-08-2025
Application form	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
